title: The Princess and the cobbler
creator_credit: Allied Filmmakers, Imogen Sutton, Richard Sutton and Richard Williams
brief_description: Set in a faraway land of magnificent palaces and beautiful Princesses, a sly thief, a shy cobbler and some very ugly brigands, do battle with an evil sorcerer to save a kingdom and rescue a beautiful princess. Following the tradition of “Aladdin” and “Ali Baba”, this animation is exciting family entertainment, with a wonderful musical score featuring the voices of Bobbi Page and Steve Lively, from “Beauty and the beast” and Vincent Price as the evil Zig Zag.
